article_title: Local hospitals face massive cut in Medicare payments
article_text:
North Andover, MA (01845)

Today

Mostly cloudy...isolated thunderstorms developing this afternoon. High near 85F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%..

Tonight

A few clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 66F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Douglas Moser dmoser@eagletribune.com

og.description: Tiny Nantucket Cottage Hospital has just 19 beds, but some accounting errors made by its large owner could have ripple effects on all hospitals statewide next year, including a $3
